name: Former Self - GMTK 2021
description:
Former Self

Submission for GMTK Game Jam 2021

Keep track of the light to make the best use of your shadow.

Controls: WASD to move, Left Mouse to Jump, Right Mouse to attack. Or plug in your favorite gamepad and it should pick it up in the browser.

If you're on a laptop or for whatever reason prefer not to use a mouse, right alt and right ctrl should work as well.

Programmed by Tom Goldthwait, Graphics by Nick Uroseva.

https://github.com/Authweight/AuthweightGMTKGameJam2021
